name: Pumpkin Spice Latte Cookies
description: The perfect cookie for when the pumpkin craving hits.
preparation: Combine the first six ingredients in a medium prep bowl and stir until thoroughly incorporated.
Combine dry ingredients in another medium prep bowl. Fold into pumpkin mixture.
Drop by the spoonful onto an Sheet Pan lined with a lightly oiled Sheet Pan Liner. Bake for 12–15 min.
tips: Make a delicious latte icing by mixing 1⁄2 tsp Pumpkin Pie Spice and 2 tbsp icing sugar with 1⁄2 cup spreadable cream cheese.

products.name: Pumpkin Pie Spice
summary: Every fall, pumpkin spice has its moment – when it gets added to endless lattes and becomes the belle of the Instagram world. And we’re here for it – especially with our Pumpkin Pie Seasoning. We can’t get enough of this stuff because it’s so versatile, is made of only good stuff – and it’s so dang delicious! Want a latte? Add it. Looking to spice up your holiday baking? Throw it in. Feel like a spicy cocktail? You know what to do. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
